properties.name: Contact Form
properties.form_template: {if $form_done}%0A {* section for displaying submission errors *}%0A {if !empty($submission_error)}%0A %3Cdiv class=%22error_message%22%3E{$submission_error}%3C/div%3E%0A {if !empty($show_submission_errors)}%0A %3Cdiv class=%22error_list%22%3E%3Cul%3E%0A {foreach $submission_error_list as $one}%3Cli%3E{$one}%3C/li%3E{/foreach}%0A %3C/ul%3E%3C/div%3E%0A {/if}%0A {/if}%0A{else}%0A {* section for displaying the form, starting with validation errors *}%0A {if !empty($form_has_validation_errors)}%0A %3Cdiv class=%22error_message%22%3E%3Cul%3E%0A {foreach $form_validation_errors as $one}%3Cli%3E{$one}%3C/li%3E{/foreach}%0A %3C/ul%3E%3C/div%3E%0A {/if}%0A {* and now the form itself *}%0A {if $css_class}%3Cdiv class=%22{$css_class}%22%3E{/if}%0A {if $total_pages %3E 1}%3Cspan%3E{$title_page_x_of_y}%3C/span%3E{/if}%0A {foreach $fields as $one}%0A {strip}%0A {if $one-%3Edisplay}%0A {if $one-%3Eneeds_div}%3Cdiv%3E{/if}%0A {if !$one-%3Ehide_name}%0A %3Clabel{if !$one-%3Emultiple_parts} for=%22{$one-%3Einput_id}%22{/if}%3E{$one-%3Ename}%0A {if $one-%3Erequired_symbol}{$one-%3Erequired_symbol}{/if}%0A %3C/label%3E%0A {/if}%0A {if $one-%3Emultiple_parts}%0A {foreach $one-%3Einput as $part}%0A {if $one-%3Elabel_parts}%0A %3Cdiv%3E{$part-%3Einput}%26nbsp;{$part-%3Ename}%3C/div%3E%0A {else}%0A {$part-%3Einput}%0A {/if}%0A {if !empty($part-%3Eop)}{$part-%3Eop}{/if}%0A {/foreach}%0A {else}%0A {if $one-%3Esmarty_eval}{eval var=$one-%3Einput}{else}{$one-%3Einput}{/if}%0A {/if}%0A {if !$one-%3Evalid} %26lt;--- {$one-%3Eerror}{/if}%0A {if $one-%3Eneeds_div}%3C/div%3E{/if}%0A {/if}%0A {/strip}%0A {/foreach}%0A %3Cdiv class=%22submit_actions%22%3E{$prev} {$submit}%3C/div%3E%0A {if $css_class}%3C/div%3E{/if}%0A{/if}
properties.submission_template: %3Cp%3EThank you, %3Cstrong%3E{$your_name}%3C/strong%3E.%3C/p%3E%0A%3Cp%3EYour submission has been successful. You may wish to print this page as a reference.%3C/p%3E%0A%3Ch3%3EContact Details%3C/h3%3E%0A%3Cp%3E%0A%3Cstrong%3EName%3C/strong%3E: {$your_name}%3Cbr /%3E%0A%3Cstrong%3EEmail%3C/strong%3E: %3Ca href=%22mailto:{$your_email_a}%22%3E{$your_email_a}%3C/a%3E%0A%3C/p%3E%0A%3Ch3%3EFeedback Details%3C/h3%3E%0A%3Cp%3E%0A%3Cstrong%3ESubject%3C/strong%3E: {$subject}%3Cbr /%3E%0A%3Cstrong%3EComments%3C/strong%3E:%3Cbr /%3E%0A{$message}%0A%3C/p%3E %0A%3Ch4%3EOther information%3C/h4%3E%0A%3Cp%3E%0A%3Cstrong%3EDate submitted%3C/strong%3E: {$sub_date}%3Cbr /%3E%0A%3Cstrong%3EIP address from which the form was submitted%3C/strong%3E: {$sub_source}%3Cbr /%3E%0A%3Cstrong%3EForm server%3C/strong%3E: {$form_host}%3Cbr /%3E%0A%3Cstrong%3EURL of page containing form%3C/strong%3E: {$form_url}%3Cbr /%3E%0A%3Cstrong%3EForm name%3C/strong%3E: {$form_name}%0A%3C/p%3E

properties.name: Your Email Address
properties.send_user_label: Send me a copy of form
properties.email_template: PowerForms Submission%0ADate submitted: {$sub_date}%0AIP address from which the form was submitted: {$sub_source}%0AForm server: {$form_host}%0AURL of page containing form: {$form_url}%0AForm name: {$form_name}%0APowerForms version: {$version}%0A----------------------------------------------%0AYour name: {$your_name}%0AYour email address: {$your_email_a}%0ASubject: {$subject}%0AMessage: {$message}

properties.name: Captcha
properties.prompt: Please enter the text from the image
properties.wrongtext: The entered text was not correct
